name: Mohammadamin Kafi
title: AI Engineer & Tech Enthusiast crafting intelligent solutions
summary: I’m an AI engineer with a full-spectrum understanding of engineering—from embedded systems and hardware optimization to advanced machine learning and large-scale software design. My diverse background lets me see the big picture and connect disciplines, building solutions that merge intelligence with robust engineering principles. I’ve tackled challenges across computer vision, NLP, robotics, and industrial automation, always aiming for systems that are both cutting-edge and dependable. My goal is to bridge the gap between theory and application, crafting technology that works seamlessly from concept to deployment.
